article_title: Hershey Med may acquire St. Joseph in Berks County
article_text: Heather Stauffer covers the health care industry. She can be reached at hstauffer@lnpnews.com or 717-481-6022.

og.description: The recent spate of health care merger activity in the region continues: Hershey Medical Center is considering acquiring St. Joseph Regional Health Network.
